@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString(".word_read@tag.p.!-1:-2@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

}

function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result=result
aa=/\{"id":(\d+).*?\}/g
li=[]
let match
while ((match = aa.exec(result)) !== null) {
  li.push({
    id: parseInt(match[1], 10),
    content: match[0]
  });
}
li.sort((a, b) => a.id - b.id)
so=li.map(item => item.content).join(',')
s=so.replace(/^/,'{"list":[').replace(/$/,']}')
s
</js>$.list[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let $ = JSON.parse(result)
  let uid = java.get("uid") != "undefined" ? java.get("uid") : "-1"
  let array = []
  $.data.chapterList.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({
    	 name: booklet.title,
    	 isv: true
    })
    booklet.chapterList.forEach((chapter) => {
    	 let sign = java.md5Encode(`BookID=${$.data.id}&UserID=${uid}&chapter_id=${chapter.id}&isDevice=Android&isMarket=true&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    	 let data = JSON.stringify({
    	   BookID: $.data.id,
    	   UserID: uid,
    	   chapter_id: chapter.id,
    	   isDevice: "Android",
    	   isMarket:"true",
    	   regDevice: "2",
    	   sign: sign
    	 })
      let op = JSON.stringify({
        method: "POST",
        body: data
      })
      array.push({
        name: chapter.title,
        url: "https://api.shaoniandream.com/Booklibrary/readchapter," + op,
        time: java.timeFormat(chapter.release_time_now * 1000),
        vip: chapter.isFree == 1,
        buy: chapter.lock == 1
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
  function login() {
  	 const user = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号"))
    const pw = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码"))
    let sign = java.md5Encode(`isDevice=Android&password=${pw}&phone=${user}&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    let data = JSON.stringify({
      isDevice: "Android",
      password: pw,
      phone: user,
      regDevice: "2",
      sign: sign
    })
    let op = JSON.stringify({
      method: "POST",
      body: data
    })
    let res = java.ajax(`https://api.shaoniandream.com/Login/login,${op}`)
    let $ = JSON.parse(res)
    if($.status != 1) java.toast($.msg)
    java.put("uid",$.data.id)
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
      logintoken: $.data.logintoken
    }))
  	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  putLoginHeader({
  	  guid: ywguid,
  	  key: ywkey
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  // java.toast("没做完:(")
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"],
    key: source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  })
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + "\n" + e.stack)
  }
}

function empty() {
  java.toast("别点了，用来看的")
}
</js>

var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>

ruleContent.content: let info = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result)) let content = "" let header = getLoginHeader() switch (info.source) { case "qd": let bid = java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax(book.tocUrl)) let cid = info.cid if (info.isVip) { let url = `https://ksapp.qidian.com/ajax/chapter/getInfo?debug=1&bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid}&_csrfToken,` + JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2', Connection: 'Keep-Alive', 'platformType': 'android', Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/', 'content-type': 'application/json', Cookie: `ywguid=${header.guid}; ywkey=${header.key}` } }) let body = JSON.parse(java.log(java.ajax(url))).data let user = body.user body = body.chapterInfo content = body.content if (body.vipStatus && !body.limitFree && !body.isBuy) { content += ("\n=============\n试读结束，继续阅读请 [购买]\n本章价格: " + body.price + "点") } } else { let request = QDSign("v2/bookcontent/safegetcontent", [ "bookId=" + bid, "chapterId=" + cid ], "", true) let body = getBytes(request.url, request.headers) let decrypt = dContentQD(cid, body) let raw = JSON.parse(decrypt) let cArr = raw.Content.split("\r\n") let blocks = {} for (let i of raw.Blocks) { blocks[i.Sort] = i } for (let i = 0; i < cArr.length; i++) { content += cArr[i] + "\n" if (blocks[i + 1] && blocks[i + 1].Type == "image") content += `\n` } } } content

loginUrl:
<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  java.toast(ywkey)
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
      guid: ywguid,
      key: ywkey,
      uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  let ywguid = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"]
  let ywkey = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function fixInformation() {
  let h = getLoginHeader()
  if (!Packages.android.text.TextUtils.isEmpty(h.uid)) {
    java.toast("您的登录信息是完整的，不需要补全")
    return
  }
  let ywkey = h.key
  let ywguid = h.guid
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  java.toast("成功")
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + e.stack)
  }
}

function tutorial() {
  java.toast("如果你是群里原书源用户，请点一下获取信息")
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

}

                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

/*

//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }

*/
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>
##更新 .*

      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

</js>
@js:
if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result
if(result.match(/txt_call/)){
	result="因网站问题没有正文"
	}
		}
result.replace(/(\\)+n/g,'<\/br>').replace(/.*?:"/,'').replace(/",".*/,'').replace(/"\}.*/,'').replace(/\\/g,'')

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro: 🔔 更新时间：{{@@[property="og:novel:update_time"]@content##\s##🔸}} 📂 内容简介：{{@@[property="og:description"]@content##.*观看小说:}}##(^|[。！？]+[”」）】]?)##$1
ruleBookInfo.name: [property="og:novel:book_name"]@content

ruleToc.chapterName: $.text##\d+\.|正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更为票谢乐发订合盟主贺补加架字修加Kk].*?[】）\)]

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content##\《|\》
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

 let id=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('onclick')).replace(/read_tz|\(|\)|;/g,"")
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
   href: `/chapter/${aid }/${id}.html`
  })
})
}
result = dataArray
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

<js>
//获取真实正文地址
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
//获取正文内容
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

bookSourceComment: 有时候网站会报错 502 导致书源请求失败，暂不清楚是网站限制访问频率，还是单纯的网站后端问题，我尝试加上遇到 502 就自动重试一次，发现还是直接 502，所以也没啥好办法，建议遇到搜索/发现/详情/目录/正文为空时，可以重试一次（目录/正文则是再 刷新 一次）

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
url=baseUrl.replace(/book/,'chapter');
m=java.ajax(url);
re=String(m).match(/[\s\S]*data-p.*?(\d+)[\s\S]*?\/ul>/)[1]
java.put("m",re)
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqxsw/)){
	java.getString('text.章节目录@href')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/kanshudashi/)){		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kanshudashi.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}else if (baseUrl.match(/kelexs/)){
		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: a.2@text
ruleSearch.name: a.1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/kele/)){
	result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")
	}else{
if(String(result).match(/\<a\>/)){
	result=java.getElements("class.list font18 chapListBody@ul@li@a")
	}else{
		result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")
		}
}
		//java.log(result)
		result
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
m=java.get("m");
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}else {
list=[]
if(JSON.parse(result).data.length>0){
	for (i = 2; i <= m; i++){
	list.push(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/,'page=' +i))
		}
		list
	}
	}

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
a=java.getElements(".section-box.1@ul@li@a");

//首章
arr=java.getString(".section-box.1@ul@li.0@a@text");
brr=java.getString(".section-box.1@ul@li.0@a@href");
list.push({text:arr,href:brr});


//中间章
for(i=1;i<a.length-1;i++){	
aa=a[i].text();

x=a[i-1].attr("href");
y=a[i].attr("href")
z=a[i+1].attr("href");
bb=y

if(a[i].attr("onclick")==0){	}else{
	java.toast("修复中");
	java.log("修复中");
d=java.ajax("https://www.djksw.com"+z);
bb=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(d).select("#prev_url").attr("href");
};

java.log(aa+bb)
list.push({text:aa,href:bb});
		}
		
//末章
q=java.getElement(".section-box@ul@li@a");
p=q.attr("href");o=q.text();
//java.log(String(o));
list.push({text:o,href:p});
	
	list
</js>

bookSourceComment:
该书源正文被分成了几页，导致一些句子被中间截断，我做了一些处理，对于这种：
"他轻轻咳嗽了
两声，提醒了一下。"
样子被截断的句子（也就是截断处的末尾是一个 汉字 或 阿拉伯数字 而非标点符号之类的），书源会将其拼合起来，并且为了避免误伤，我也做了特殊处理，书源会使用 "㏒" 符号来标记分页处（我专门找了个这种在网络小说界及其冷门的小众符号，避免误伤），书源只会检查分页处有该符号的文字是否被截断。
